http-vocab:body.cnt:chars:
Not being able to use your computer because your mouse doesn't work, is frustrating. Many people use only the keyboard to navigate websites. Either through preference or circumstance. This is solved by keyboard compatibility. Keyboard compatibility is described in WCAG.

See the video below to watch the same information again in video form.

result.info: The `<video>` element is not labelled as an alternative for text

http-vocab:body.cnt:chars: Web Accessibility Perspectives: Keyboard Accessibility. Not being able to use your computer because your mouse doesn't work, is frustrating. Many people use only the keyboard to navigate websites. Either through preference or circumstance. This is solved by keyboard compatibility. Keyboard compatibility is described in WCAG. See the video below to watch the same information again in video form.
